name: get_file_info
description: Retrieves metadata about a file, including its row count, column count, and a preview of its contents. Supports Excel, CSV, JSON, JSONL, TXT, PDF, and image (JPG, JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP) formats.

file_path.description: The full path of the file to retrieve information from.

preview_rows.description: The number of rows to preview from the file content. Default is 5.
